title: Thread issues
body:
Everytime I post a thread in the concept thread, cloudflare keeps blocking me.
And also I just posted a thread a few minutes ago concerning about my thread issues, and now it's gone!

replies.body: That's strange!  Could be a cache or extension issue causing this, so clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) could help!  If the issue continues, though, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look directly.
